benefits.name: Free admission to the art gallery
benefits.description: Members receive free admission to the art gallery, including special exhibitions.

benefits.name: 10% discount on art purchases
benefits.description: Members receive a 10% discount on all art purchases, including prints, paintings, and sculptures.

benefits.name: Free admission to the art gallery for up to 2 adults and 2 children
benefits.description: Family members receive free admission to the art gallery, including special exhibitions.

benefits.name: 15% discount on art purchases
benefits.description: Family members receive a 15% discount on all art purchases, including prints, paintings, and sculptures.

benefits.name: Invitation to exclusive member events
benefits.description: Family members are invited to exclusive member events, such as gallery talks, receptions, and workshops.

benefits.name: Free admission to the art gallery for up to 4 adults and 4 children
benefits.description: Patron members receive free admission to the art gallery, including special exhibitions.

benefits.name: 20% discount on art purchases
benefits.description: Patron members receive a 20% discount on all art purchases, including prints, paintings, and sculptures.

benefits.name: Invitation to exclusive patron events
benefits.description: Patron members are invited to exclusive patron events, such as private tours, dinners, and receptions.

benefits.name: Recognition in the art gallery's annual report
benefits.description: Patron members' names are recognized in the art gallery's annual report.
